TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PolicyAssertionCollection extends System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class System.Xml.XmlElement>
Public Class PolicyAssertionCollection Inherits Collection(Of XmlElement)

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyAssertionCollection> 类不但可以将策略断言分组，还可枚举或修改断言组。
<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyAssertionCollection> 最常用作 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext> 类的方法的返回值。
